title: Go Away, Lily
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 75 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: Lily irritated Jack by doing everything he did. He told Lily to go away. What will happen with Lily and Jack? Go Away, Lily provides an opportunity for students to retell the story and investigate simple cause-and-effect relationships. Illustrations support the text. High-frequency words and repetitive phrases make this book perfect for beginning readers.
meta: ate, played, ran, read, sat, slept
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand and remember story events
Cause and Effect : Identify cause and effect
Exclamation Marks : Identify and use exclamation point
Alphabetizing : Understand how to alphabetize words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
